mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into s_l_user_logon (user_id, user_code, login_ip, mac_addr, mobile_info, create_person, create_date, create_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{macAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update s_l_user_logon set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_code = #{userCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, login_ip = #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mac_addr = #{macAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_info = #{mobileInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_person = #{createPerson,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, user_code, login_ip, mac_addr, mobile_info, create_person, create_date, create_time from s_l_user_logon where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_id, user_code, login_ip, mac_addr, mobile_info, create_person, create_date, create_time from s_l_user_logon
